thread.title: Jamal Crawford hilariously mimicked a thunderous Blake Griffin dunk
thread.title_full: Jamal Crawford hilariously mimicked a thunderous Blake Griffin dunk

author: James Dator
title: Jamal Crawford hilariously mimicked a thunderous Blake Griffin dunk
text:
A friend is there for you. They lift you up when you’re down, and when you do something great they’re there to celebrate with you.
Get you a friend like Jamal Crawford. #ItTakesEverything pic.twitter.com/q6v7NmHiHD 
— NBA (@NBA) March 7, 2017 Jamal Crawford is a big fan of Blake Griffin dunks, and when he found himself in the lane at the same time he couldn’t resist following in his teammate’s footsteps and mimicking his dunk.
Initially you might think that he was following for the rebound, just in case — but there’s no way that he did Griffin’s exact move by accident. This was just being a good friend. 
Get you someone who looks at Blake the way Jamal does.
